+#pragma once
+
+#include<iostream>
+#include<vector>
+#include "Point.h"
+
+#define SIZE 4
+#define UP		'U'
+#define DOWN	'D'
+#define LEFT	'L'
+#define RIGHT	'R'
+
+using namespace std;
+
+class NavMap
+{
+
+public:
+    NavMap();
+    ~NavMap();
+    Point getPoint(int x, int y);
+    void printMap();
+
+private:
+    vector<Point> _theMap;
+
+};
